name: cobol
description: COBOL (COmmon Business-Oriented Language) is a compiled English-like computer programming language designed for business use. COBOL is imperative, procedural and, since 2002, object-oriented. COBOL is primarily used in business, finance, and administrative systems for companies and governments.
